name: Shootback - Group 9
description:
A top down shoot'em up game where the players ability shoot has been taken away and now the only way the player can defeat enemies is by dodging their bullets to get them to shoot one another.

Gameplay walk-through available at: https://willoughby.itch.io/group-9-shootback

Group 9 game

Willoughby Axtell (Level 5 Designer)

Lewis Arnold (Level 4 Programmer)

Ethan Probert (Level 4 Designer)

Bailey Keeble (Level 5 Designer)
